description: The optimum breeding window for an animal in heat

startDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the optimum insemination window starts (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

endDateTime.description: RFC3339 UTC date/time when the optimum insemination window ends (see https://ijmacd.github.io/rfc3339-iso8601/ for format guidance).

windowName.description: The name of the optimum insemination breeding window.
